constituent: zero, rain, weather, orders, meeting, chop-seal, hanko
koohiiStory1: The amount of people that can order the rain to rain.
koohiiStory2: Despite the rain, the zero pilot flies on. He has kamikaze orders.
words:
零す(こぼす): to spill
零れる(こぼれる): to overflow, to spill
零点(れいてん): zero, no marks
零(れい): zero, nought
